[[File:Lída Holubová - Celebration.jpg|thumb|150px|''Celebration'' by [[:Category:Images by Lída Holubová|Lída Holubová]]]] The '''Party Field''' was a large field south of [[Bag End]]'s front door adjacent to [[Bagshot Row]] near [[Hobbiton]]. ==History== In the preparations for [[Bilbo's Farewell Party|Bilbo's 111th birthday party]], a special entrance was cut into the bank, and a large white gate and steps connected it to the road, and an open-air kitchen was installed in its north corner, manned with cooks from many inns and taverns of the vicinity. The field was covered with tents and pavilions; underneath the largest pavilion was the [[Party Tree]], a decorated tree that stood at the head of the table. Bilbo made his farewell speech beneath it.{{FR|I1}} After the destruction of the Party Tree by [[Sharkey]] and his [[Ruffians]],{{RK|VI8}} [[Samwise Gamgee]] planted a [[mallorn]] tree, upon his return from the [[Quest of the Ring]]{{RK|VI9}} and it blossomed on [[6 April]] {{TA|3020}}{{App|Chief}} Afterwards it was used for holidays and celebrations by the [[Hobbits]] of that region including a new holiday celebrated on April 6.There are several possible origins for the holiday:
* It was the birthday of [[Samwise Gamgee|Sam Gardner]]
* It was the date of the [[Elves|Elven]] New Year
* It is the day that the [[Golden Tree]] first flowered in [[TA|3020]] (Shire-reckoning 1420).{{App|D2}} ==Portrayal in adaptations== [[File:The Lord of the Rings Online - Party Field.jpg|thumb|200px|left|Party Field in ''[[The Lord of the Rings Online]]'']] '''2007: ''[[The Lord of the Rings Online]]'':''' :The Party Field and the Party Tree lie directly south from Bag End. It is a major place of activity for the game's various seasonal festivals and anniversary celebrations. During such events various games, dances, drinking challenges and riddle contest are taking place around the Party Tree. {{references|notes}} [[Category:Fields, plains and deserts]] [[Category:The Shire]] [[de:Festwiese]] [[fi:Juhlakenttä]]
